definition: healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Those boys go ahead when we are hiking.
sentences.chinese: 在健行的时候那些男孩走在前面。

sentences.english: Finally, I had the first bushwalking trip in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 终于在澳洲有了第一次的森林健行。

sentences.english: NO06, Let's fill our water bottles before we start hiking.
sentences.chinese: 我们在健行前先把水壶装满。

sentences.english: They may go hiking around the island, or swimming in the ocean .
sentences.chinese: 他们可以绕岛健行或在海洋里游泳。

sentences.english: I need to buy a new pair of boots for my hiking trip.
sentences.chinese: 我需要买双新的靴子以便健行之旅用。

sentences.english: Sam and his friends went treakking in the mountains last weekend.
sentences.chinese: 山姆和他的朋友上个周末到山上健行。

sentences.english: I wake up before the sun comes up, hike into the forest, and cut down trees with my own two hands.
sentences.chinese: 我还没日出就起床，然后健行到森林里用双手砍树。

sentences.english: I'm going to go hiking on Yangmingshan. Do you want to join me?
sentences.chinese: 我明天要去阳明山健行。你要和我一块去吗？

sentences.english: How do you feel after a long hike?
sentences.chinese: 健行了那么一大段路后你感觉如何？

sentences.english: Ally and John are out hiking in Smithson National Park.
sentences.chinese: 艾莉和约翰正在史密森国家公园健行。

definition: to seek unusual scenery or places
to strengthen one's body/to keep fit/to build up one's health (through exercise, nutrition etc)
to stand tall and see far (idiom); taking the long and broad view/acute foresight
to make the world a better place
